name: Stilted
description:
A "Foddy like" project for a school project. You play as a piece of sushi trying to escape a restaurant on a pair of chopsticks like stilts. 

Use A-D to rotate the left leg, use left arrow key - right arrow key to rotate the right leg.

Made during a two week period.

Teammates

Art and Design: Christian Bondi

Sound and Design: Sam Aziminejad 

Programming and Design: Me
